name: URIAndEntityName

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description: The combination of a URI and an optional ScopedEntityName and an optional designation for a resource.

element.definition: The combination of a URI and an optional ScopedEntityName and an optional designation for a resource.

element.name: uri
element.short: a URI that uniquely references the target entity
element.definition: a URI that uniquely references the target entity

element.name: href
element.short: a URI that resolves to the full EntityDescription represented by this resource
element.definition: a URI that resolves to the full EntityDescription represented by this resource

element.name: namespace
element.short: an identifier that references a unique namespace URI within the context of the service
element.definition: an identifier that references a unique namespace URI within the context of the service

element.name: name
element.short: the local entity name within the context of the namespace
element.definition: the local entity name within the context of the namespace. What is chosen for the entity name is service specific

element.name: designation
element.short: a designation considered appropriate for the entity in the specific context of use
element.definition: a designation considered appropriate for the entity in the specific context of use
